name: Clevernode
description: Clevernode's native token, CLV, acts as the mining reward token within its ecosystem. Clevernode serves as the hosting platform for Evernode decentralized applications (dApps) on the Xahau ledger, which operates as a sidechain of the XRPL (XRP Ledger). Users have the opportunity to rent an Evernode host and earn rewards in $EVR tokens.
